text:
DateFormat.getDateTimeInstance is expensive, and we can cache the value so that we don't need to call it every time.

In the file :

./apache-ant-1.8.2/src/main/org/apache/tools/ant/DefaultLogger.java   line: 365

In the function getTimestamp.

This bug is similar to the bug  Apache 48778
creator: xiaoming@cs.wisc.edu
